page.title: 01A General view of our area.
page.content: Class 5 walked to{Carn Brea}(a hill near our school) to view our D.Block.We could see{Tehidy Golf {Course}and{Tehidy Woods.}There is the village of{Illogan,Bridge,Vogue Beloth and{Paynter's Lane End.}The buildings of Treloweth School and{Tehidy {Hospital}could be clearly seen.Down the road from our Treloweth School is a housing estate called the{Guiness {Trust.}It was built two years ago.We have many farms and mines in our area.Many of the mines are on derelict land and are disused.Some farmers have tourists for{Bed & Breakfast}and campers stay for a couple of weeks.The farms are mainly small and have small fields for their cows and horses to graze in.We have also part of {Portreath valley}in our D.Block and part of the{Portreath Coast line}at {Porth-Cadjack Cove.
